title: Allan Gardens Winter Flower Show
caption: Allan Gardens Winter Flower Show
desc: Between Dec. 1 and Jan. 12, Allan Gardens Conservatory hosts the Winter Flower Show transforming the indoor botanical garden into a beautiful festive site. Thousands of flowering plants take over the entire conservatory featuring floral decor inspired by the holiday season. Entrance to this event in Toronto is free of cost and offers horse-drawn wagon rides, cookies and cider and festive crafts as well.
